originalText.text: I am working with Jessica Jordan now. My wedding is at the end of December 2023. Jessica is extraordinary. She is kind, professional, creative, with a thorough knowledge of the event, industry from inside and out. Her aesthetic is beautiful and she is a delight to work with!

text.text: I am working with Jessica Jordan now. My wedding is at the end of December 2023. Jessica is extraordinary. She is kind, professional, creative, with a thorough knowledge of the event, industry from inside and out. Her aesthetic is beautiful and she is a delight to work with!

originalText.text: Jessica is one of the most talented professionals in the event planning space today.  As a seasoned photographer, I have worked with many many planners and Jessica always has her house in order both for her clients AND her vendors.  That is rare and it's a recipe for success because when everyone is being looked after in a professional and courteous way, the event runs better and the client is happier.  Jessica knows this.  Whenever she calls me for work I pray I am available because it's a no-brainer for me to entertain the job - just so I can work with Jessica again.  If you are in the market for a planner in NYC and surrounding areas, I'd say look no further and hire Jessica!

originalText.text:
Hiring Jessica Jordan as our full service wedding planner was the best decision my husband and I made. From the first introductory meeting Jessica was highly organized, responsive and patient. We were in London at the time and she worked with us virtually before we got back to NYC. Jessica has a very detailed process for full service wedding planning. Her list and variety of vendors are top tier.

Every aspect of wedding planning was seamless, even despite the pandemic. Our wedding planning lasted 15 months in total. Throughout the entire time of wedding planning Jessica’s work was phenomenal. Jessica was not only our wedding planner but she also did floral and the design scheme. I wanted an elegant wedding that was chic and Jessica’s eye for design was impeccable.

Jessica also attended all bridal fittings with me and made the process of becoming a bride a special moment. On our wedding day Jessica and her Jessica Jordan Events team were all amazing. She and her team made sure the entire day ran smoothly! We had two venue locations and the entire day was magical.

I highly recommend hiring Jessica Jordan as a full service wedding planner, she truly went above and beyond working on our wedding. She made my dream wedding come true and I learned so many aspects of the wedding industry that made my dream wedding even better than I could have imagined. I even cultivated good relationships with all the vendors which were all extremely professional and amazing people. I appreciate everything Jessica did for us and happy to call her a good friend now!

Our guest are still raving about the floral and design skills by Jessica the details were immaculate!

-Justine & Steve

originalText.text: I cannot recommend Jessica more highly. She helped plan a 50th birthday party at our home and everything was seamless.  From the caterer to the music to the lighting, each vendor she recommended was perfect for the occasion and great to work with. She also was conscious of the budget we set out, and at the same time she came up with ideas to make the event more personal and enduring. She also ran everything during the event so that my wife and I could truly be hosts. I would absolutely work with her again.

text.text: I cannot recommend Jessica more highly. She helped plan a 50th birthday party at our home and everything was seamless.  From the caterer to the music to the lighting, each vendor she recommended was perfect for the occasion and great to work with. She also was conscious of the budget we set out, and at the same time she came up with ideas to make the event more personal and enduring. She also ran everything during the event so that my wife and I could truly be hosts. I would absolutely work with her again.

originalText.text:
Hiring Jessica Jordan Events for our 2018 Manhattan wedding was both the easiest and best decision we made.  From our first meeting, we knew that Jessica was going to be the game changer for us in helping to achieve the non-conventional wedding of our dreams.  She was kind, honest and knowledgeable beyond belief.  Jessica was able to help us turn ideas we didn’t think would be possible, into realities our guests still rave about to this day.

Jessica was incredibly patient with us as we struggled to decide between two fantastic wedding bands.  She arranged several opportunities for us to see each of the bands multiple times, including having us as her guests at an industry event so that we felt completely comfortable with our decision.  Jessica’s dedication to making sure we were happy and confident with every wedding related detail, made planning this special event stress-free and fun.

When inevitable problems did arise, Jessica handled them efficiently and with poise. Her calm demeanor, thoughtfulness and positivity helped us to relax and enjoy our big day!  People seem surprised when we tell them that we actually got to eat at our own wedding, but because of Jessica, we did! We were able to enjoy every moment of our special day without ever having to worry about logistics.

Jessica’s expertise, guidance and sincerity made her the absolute perfect person to help us plan and execute the most important day in our lives.  We look forward to working with Jessica again in the future and are proud to call her a friend!
